channel.title: Compiler on Systology
channel.description: Recent content in Compiler on Systology

item.title: Compiler Design
item.description: Guidelines for compiler design: clear IR boundaries, deterministic semantics, robust error reporting, and incremental compilation.

item.title: VirtuC
item.description: Rust-implemented compiler for a C subset that emits LLVM IR and focuses on AST design, semantic checks, and IR validation for teaching.
